Detailed Description

Extract character classes from NFA and simplify.
Author:
C. Scott Ananian 25-Jul-1999

Definition at line 2324 of file Main.java.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void JLex.CSimplifyNfa.computeClasses ( CSpec  m_spec  )  [private]

Compute minimum set of character classes needed to disambiguate edges. We optimistically assume that every character belongs to a single character class, and then incrementally split classes as we see edges that require discrimination between characters in the class. [CSA, 25-Jul-1999]

Definition at line 2356 of file Main.java.

References JLex.SparseBitSet.and(), JLex.CSimplifyNfa.ccls, JLex.SparseBitSet.clearAll(), JLex.CSet.contains(), JLex.SparseBitSet.get(), JLex.CSpec.m_dtrans_ncols, JLex.CNfa.m_edge, JLex.CSpec.m_nfa_states, JLex.CNfa.m_set, JLex.CSimplifyNfa.original_charset_size, JLex.SparseBitSet.set(), and JLex.SparseBitSet.size.

Referenced by JLex.CSimplifyNfa.simplify().

02356                                             {
02357     this.original_charset_size = m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols;

02360     int nextcls = 1;

02362     Hashtable h = new Hashtable();
02363     
02364     System.out.print("Working on character classes.");
02365     for (Enumeration e=m_spec.m_nfa_states.elements(); e.hasMoreElements(); ) {
02366       CNfa nfa = (CNfa) e.nextElement();
02367       if (nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EMPTY || nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EPSILON)
02368         continue; // no discriminatory information.
02369       clsA.clearAll(); clsB.clearAll();
02370       for (int i=0; i<ccls.length; i++)
02371         if (nfa.m_edge==i || // edge labeled with a character
02372             nfa.m_edge==CNfa.CCL && nfa.m_set.contains(i)) // set of characters
02373           clsA.set(ccls[i]);
02374         else
02375           clsB.set(ccls[i]);
02376       // now figure out which character classes we need to split.
02377       clsA.and(clsB); // split the classes which show up on both sides of edge
02378       System.out.print(clsA.size()==0?".":":");
02379       if (clsA.size()==0) continue; // nothing to do.
02380       // and split them.
02381       h.clear(); // h will map old to new class name
02382       for (int i=0; i<ccls.length; i++)
02383         if (clsA.get(ccls[i])) // a split class
02384           if (nfa.m_edge==i ||
02385               nfa.m_edge==CNfa.CCL && nfa.m_set.contains(i)) { // on A side
02386             Integer split = new Integer(ccls[i]);
02387             if (!h.containsKey(split))
02388               h.put(split, new Integer(nextcls++)); // make new class
02389             ccls[i] = ((Integer)h.get(split)).intValue();
02390           }
02391     }
02392     System.out.println();
02393     System.out.println("NFA has "+nextcls+" distinct character classes.");
02394     
02395     this.mapped_charset_size = nextcls;
